titles.title: Robins Facilities Enhancement Act
Robins Facilities Enhancement Act
A bill to authorize the appropriation of amounts for the construction of a battle management combined operations complex at Robins Air Force Base, Georgia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Robins Facilities Enhancement Act
This bill authorizes FY2025 appropriations for the Department of Defense to construct a battle management combined operations complex at Robins Air Force Base, Georgia.
